r.d: Package containes locale validation for FR such as: * SSN * Postal Code * RIB * SIREN * SIRET * Region (Departements)
r.n: - Split from Validate into independent package - CS fixes - BC break! postalCode unified between countries (name wise), now all postcode validation funcs are named postalCode - added region() (departments) and postalCode - fixed rib calculation - bertrand Gugger added as lead/maintainer
